channel.title: composability on Oh The Huge Manatee!

item.title: Building blocks for autonomous driving simulation environments
item.description: My team’s work with Volkswagen on an autonomous driving simulation environments just turned into a new Azure Well-Architected page, which makes this a good time to add some behind-the-scenes commentary from real world experience. The architecture recommended there came from a lot of discovery and experimentation work, and suits quite a broad case that I think is not well represented (yet) in cloud computing products. The challenge Testing and CI-style validation in autonomous driving development are a tricky challenge.
